title.narrative: Renforcement et promotion des initiatives de la société civile pour un développement durable de la commune vulnérable de Cité Soleil

description.narrative: Objectif Global :Renforcement des capacités des organisations de la société civile dans des sections communales vulnérables de Cité Soleil (Zone métropolitaine de Port-au-Prince) afin de participer aux stratégies de réduction de la vulnérabilité et promouvoir des initiatives de développement durable. Objectif spécifique :Le développement des organisations de la société civile de Cité Soleil afin de doter la communauté dun outil élaboré pour améliorer la situation deau, dassainisseme

description.narrative: Reported results indicators by the European Commission ¿ International Cooperation and Development (DEVCO) may not represent the complete set of indicators monitored for the project. The results are reported using a contribution approach. This means that where a project has been financed by the EU jointly with other funders ¿ such as partner country governments or other donors ¿ the overall outputs of the collective effort are reported rather than outputs attributed to the share of funding provided by the EU. For higher levels of results, such as outcomes and impacts, the project will only have contributed to the overall effort.
